history.text:
The movie is Marvels 2012 The Avengers and is a superhero
 movie.
Don't think I ever got around to seeing it
It has actors like Robert Downey Jr as Tony Stark and Chris Evans as Captain America
Saw earlier ones with those characters and actors, by the time this movie game out I was feeling burned out on them
It is the sixth film
Sixth including the individual character intro movies (Thor, Iron Man, etc)?
Yes in this one Samuel L. Jackson is Nick Fury and he recruits them all for a team.
OK, maybe I did actually see this one.  First time with all the characters on a single team.  Didn't realize they managed to milk out the whole thing for THAT many movies
The villain is Thor's brother Loki.
Definitely remember Loki, from this movie and I guess two Thor movies
Do you care about movie ratings it had a 92% on Rotten Tomatoes
Surprised it rated that high.  Thought it was good, for a Sci Fi-ish action
Some of the plot includes the searching for the Tesseract which is a energy source of unknown potential.
Don't recall that part, but then it's been a while since I've seen this movie
It is a bit older having been made in 2012.
Seems that way to me, seems they've pumped out hundreds more since then
The director on this one was Joss Whedon
Don't know him or of him.
Do you like superhero movies?
I did a while ago.  They just suddenly started putting out so many it seemed they were milking the genre for all its worth and I burned out

uid2response.feedback: Already seen the movie and don't consider it remarkable enough to see it again.  Conversation was slow, took forever.  Was not presented with a document to read during the conversation.
